verbs.description: as [ARG1: sea ice] [V: melts] some say walruses need better protection given a choice between giving birth on land or sea ice pacific walrus mothers most often choose ice likewise they prefer sea ice for molting mating nursing and resting between dives for food trouble is as the century progresses there going to be far less ice around how well walruses cope with less sea ice is at the heart of a legal fight over whether walruses should be listed as a threatened species giving them an added protection against human encroachments point lay trump ryan kingsberyus shaye wolf chukchi sea ryan kingsbery u s beaufort sea president donald trump arctic texas united states fish and wildlife service u s chad jay u s fish and wildlife service protection barack obama geological survey president united states geological survey director anchorage alaska center for biological diversity justice department anchorage alaska russia
